result.eng: Does the plan suit you?
result.ga: An oireann an plean duit
result.orig: An oireann an plean duit
result.html: An oireann an plean duitDoes the plan suit you?
result.ponchtml: An oireann an plean duitDoes the plan suit you?

result.eng: Did I give you enough food?
result.ga: Ar thug mé dóthain bia duit
result.orig: Ar thug mé dóthain bia duit
result.html: Ar thug mé dóthain bia duitDid I give you enough food?
result.ponchtml: Ar ṫug mé dóṫain bia duitDid I give you enough food?

result.eng: What is your name again, please?
result.ga: Cad is ainm duit arís le do thoil
result.orig: Cad is ainm duit arís le do thoil
result.html: Cad is ainm duit arís le do thoilWhat is your name again, please?
result.ponchtml: Cad is ainm duit arís le do ṫoilWhat is your name again, please?

result.eng: What is your name?
result.ga: Cad is ainm duit
result.orig: Cad is ainm duit
result.html: Cad is ainm duitWhat is your name?
result.ponchtml: Cad is ainm duitWhat is your name?

result.eng: Where are you from originally?
result.ga: Cá as duit ó dhúchas
result.orig: Cá as duit ó dhúchas
result.html: Cá as duit ó dhúchasWhere are you from originally?
result.ponchtml: Cá as duit ó ḋúċasWhere are you from originally?

result.eng: Where are you from?
result.ga: Cá as duit
result.orig: Cá as duit
result.html: Cá as duitWhere are you from?
result.ponchtml: Cá as duitWhere are you from?

result.eng: A spell in the army will do you good.
result.ga: Déanfaidh seal san arm maitheas duit
result.orig: Déanfaidh seal san arm maitheas duit
result.html: Déanfaidh seal san arm maitheas duitA spell in the army will do you good.
result.ponchtml: Déanfaiḋ seal san arm maiṫeas duitA spell in the army will do you good.

result.eng: I promise you that it will be done.
result.ga: Geallaim duit go mbeidh sé déanta
result.orig: Geallaim duit go mbeidh sé déanta
result.html: Geallaim duit go mbeidh sé déantaI promise you that it will be done.
result.ponchtml: Geallaim duit go mbeiḋ sé déantaI promise you that it will be done.

result.eng: You are right.
result.ga: Is fíor duit
result.orig: Is fíor duit
result.html: Is fíor duitYou are right.
result.ponchtml: Is fíor duitYou are right.

result.eng: As you know, the deadline is tomorrow.
result.ga: Mar is eol duit amárach an spriocdháta
result.orig: Mar is eol duit amárach an spriocdháta
result.html: Mar is eol duit amárach an spriocdhátaAs you know, the deadline is tomorrow.
result.ponchtml: Mar is eol duit amáraċ an spriocḋátaAs you know, the deadline is tomorrow.

result.eng: If you are not warm enough, I have a spare coat for you.
result.ga: Mura bhfuil tú te go leor tá cóta breise agam duit
result.orig: Mura bhfuil tú te go leor tá cóta breise agam duit
result.html: Mura bhfuil tú te go leor tá cóta breise agam duitIf you are not warm enough, I have a spare coat for you.
result.ponchtml: Mura ḃfuil tú te go leor tá cóta breise agam duitIf you are not warm enough, I have a spare coat for you.

result.eng: You don't need to wait till the end.
result.ga: Ní gá duit fanacht go dtí an deireadh
result.orig: Ní gá duit fanacht go dtí an deireadh
result.html: Ní gá duit fanacht go dtí an deireadhYou don't need to wait till the end.
result.ponchtml: Ní gá duit fanaċt go dtí an deireaḋYou don't need to wait till the end.

result.eng: You do not have to state your address but if you do, we will be able to reply personally.
result.ga: Ní gá duit seoladh a thabhairt ach má dhéanann tú amhlaidh beidh muid in ann freagra pearsanta a thabhairt
result.orig: Ní gá duit seoladh a thabhairt ach má dhéanann tú amhlaidh beidh muid in ann freagra pearsanta a thabhairt
result.html: Ní gá duit seoladh a thabhairt ach má dhéanann tú amhlaidh beidh muid in ann freagra pearsanta a thabhairtYou do not have to state your address but if you do, we will be able to reply personally.
result.ponchtml: Ní gá duit seolaḋ a ṫaḃairt aċ má ḋéanann tú aṁlaiḋ beiḋ muid in ann freagra pearsanta a ṫaḃairtYou do not have to state your address but if you do, we will be able to reply personally.

result.eng: You should talk to your parents about it.
result.ga: Ní mór duit dul i gcomhairle le do thuismitheoirí ina thaobh
result.orig: Ní mór duit dul i gcomhairle le do thuismitheoirí ina thaobh
result.html: Ní mór duit dul i gcomhairle le do thuismitheoirí ina thaobhYou should talk to your parents about it.
result.ponchtml: Ní mór duit dul i gcoṁairle le do ṫuismiṫeoirí ina ṫaoḃYou should talk to your parents about it.

result.eng: Pint of Guinness please. - There you are. - Good man. {thank you}
result.ga: Pionta Guinness le do thoil - Seo duit - Maith an fear
result.orig: Pionta Guinness le do thoil - Seo duit - Maith an fear
result.html: Pionta Guinness le do thoil - Seo duit - Maith an fearPint of Guinness please. - There you are. - Good man. {thank you}
result.ponchtml: Pionta Guinness le do ṫoil - Seo duit - Maiṫ an fearPint of Guinness please. - There you are. - Good man. {thank you}

result.eng: I made you breakfast.
result.ga: Rinne mé bricfeasta duit
result.orig: Rinne mé bricfeasta duit
result.html: Rinne mé bricfeasta duitI made you breakfast.
result.ponchtml: Rinne mé bricfeasta duitI made you breakfast.

result.eng: Here is your money back.
result.ga: Seo duit do chuid airgid ar ais
result.orig: Seo duit do chuid airgid ar ais
result.html: Seo duit do chuid airgid ar aisHere is your money back.
result.ponchtml: Seo duit do ċuid airgid ar aisHere is your money back.

result.eng: You will get an e-mail after you register.
result.ga: Seolfar ríomhphost chugat tar éis duit clárú
result.orig: Seolfar ríomhphost chugat tar éis duit clárú
result.html: Seolfar ríomhphost chugat tar éis duit clárúYou will get an e-mail after you register.
result.ponchtml: Seolfar ríoṁṗost ċugat tar éis duit clárúYou will get an e-mail after you register.

result.eng: We will give you all the data.
result.ga: Tabharfaidh muid na sonraí uilig duit
result.orig: Tabharfaidh muid na sonraí uilig duit
result.html: Tabharfaidh muid na sonraí uilig duitWe will give you all the data.
result.ponchtml: Taḃarfaiḋ muid na sonraí uilig duitWe will give you all the data.

result.ga: Dia duit a Liam
result.orig: Dia duit a Liam
result.html: Dia duit a LiamHello, Liam.

result.eng: Hello, Áine.
result.ga: Dia is Muire duit a Áine
result.orig: Dia is Muire duit a Áine
result.html: Dia is Muire duit a ÁineHello, Áine.
result.ponchtml: Dia is Muire duit a ÁineHello, Áine.

result.eng: If I am your best friend, then that is a sorry state of affairs for you.
result.ga: Más mise an cara is deise duit is truacánta an mhaise duit
result.orig: Más mise an cara is deise duit is truacánta an mhaise duit
result.html: Más mise an cara is deise duit is truacánta an mhaise duitIf I am your best friend, then that is a sorry state of affairs for you.
result.ponchtml: Más mise an cara is deise duit is truacánta an ṁaise duitIf I am your best friend, then that is a sorry state of affairs for you.

result.eng: It's a good thing you told the truth, and for that I'll leave you alone.
result.ga: Is maith a rinne tú an fhírinne a inse agus ar a shon sin ní bhainfear duit
result.orig: Is maith a rinne tú an fhírinne a inse agus ar a shon sin ní bhainfear duit
result.html: Is maith a rinne tú an fhírinne a inse agus ar a shon sin ní bhainfear duitIt's a good thing you told the truth, and for that I'll leave you alone.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ a rinne tú an ḟírinne a inse agus ar a ẛon sin ní ḃainfear duitIt's a good thing you told the truth, and for that I'll leave you alone.

result.eng: It is unsuitable for you to hang out with people like him.
result.ga: Ní cuideachta ar an domhan duit é
result.orig: Ní cuideachta ar an domhan duit é
result.html: Ní cuideachta ar an domhan duit éIt is unsuitable for you to hang out with people like him.
result.ponchtml: Ní cuideaċta ar an doṁan duit éIt is unsuitable for you to hang out with people like him.

result.eng: How little is what you have done worth to you?
result.ga: Cá beag duit a bhfuil déanta agat
result.orig: Cá beag duit a bhfuil déanta agat
result.html: Cá beag duit a bhfuil déanta agatHow little is what you have done worth to you?
result.ponchtml: Cá beag duit a ḃfuil déanta agatHow little is what you have done worth to you?

result.eng: You should talk to people of your own social standing.
result.ga: Ba chóir duit bheith ag caint le do mhacasamhail féin eile
result.orig: Ba chóir duit bheith ag caint le do mhacasamhail féin eile
result.html: Ba chóir duit bheith ag caint le do mhacasamhail féin eileYou should talk to people of your own social standing.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċóir duit ḃeiṫ ag caint le do ṁacasaṁail féin eileYou should talk to people of your own social standing.

result.eng: I'll be here for you when you come back.
result.ga: Beidh mise anseo fá do choinne ag teacht duit
result.orig: Beidh mise anseo fá do choinne ag teacht duit
result.html: Beidh mise anseo fá do choinne ag teacht duitI'll be here for you when you come back.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ mise anseo fá do ċoinne ag teaċt duitI'll be here for you when you come back.

result.eng: You should know that going abroad is no picnic.
result.ga: Bíodh a fhios agat nach só ar bith atá i ndán duit ar an choigrích
result.orig: Bíodh a fhios agat nach só ar bith atá i ndán duit ar an choigrích
result.html: Bíodh a fhios agat nach só ar bith atá i ndán duit ar an choigríchYou should know that going abroad is no picnic.
result.ponchtml: Bíoḋ a ḟios agat naċ só ar biṫ atá i ndán duit ar an ċoigríċYou should know that going abroad is no picnic.

result.eng: All you need to care aboit in this world is to steal in a way the law allows.
result.ga: Is cuma duit ar an tsaol seo ach goid de réir dlí
result.orig: Is cuma duit ar an tsaol seo ach goid de réir dlí
result.html: Is cuma duit ar an tsaol seo ach goid de réir dlíAll you need to care aboit in this world is to steal in a way the law allows.
result.ponchtml: Is cuma duit ar an tsaol seo aċ goid de réir dlíAll you need to care aboit in this world is to steal in a way the law allows.

result.eng: You know what my advice to you is?
result.ga: 'Bhfuil a fhios agat goidé mo chomhairlese duit
result.orig: 'Bhfuil a fhios agat goidé mo chomhairlese duit
result.html: 'Bhfuil a fhios agat goidé mo chomhairlese duitYou know what my advice to you is?
result.ponchtml: 'Ḃfuil a ḟios agat goidé mo ċoṁairlese duitYou know what my advice to you is?
